name: subathon
response: HOW THE SUBATHON WORKS: This is MrDemonWolf's Birthday Bash! We start with a 6-hour base stream which is split into two parts one on Jun 2 & other one on June 29. To keep the tech talks & tail wags going, YOU can add time! ðŸ”¥ New Follows, $1 Tips, and 100 Bits add +2 minutes each. Tier 1 Sub/Gifted adds +10 minutes. Tier 2 adds +20 minutes. Tier 3 adds a mighty +50 minutes! Join the hunt for a 24-hour stream!
